I provoke new insight through adventure and play.

Watch My Businessweek Design Talk

I start out discussing of zombies and ended by having the whole audience taking each other’s pulse. See the full talk.

Explore Patterns of Transformation

What do sex parties, funerals, and wilderness trips have in common? More than you think. I’m creating a unified design reference for transformative social experiences. Explore and contribute.

Read About Sextantworks

My previous design practice, Sextantworks, created experiences in places you aren’t supposed to be. Read the coverage in Businessweek, The New Yorker, and The New York Times.

Discover SYPartners

SYPartners hired me as a “true maverick” with singular expertise in experiences design. I am advancing their work to create large-scale positive impact on society through individual and organizational transformation. Discover SYPartners’ consulting work.
